name: DiscordClicker
description:
DiscordClicker

Ever wanted to run a discord sever with so many people in it, that the member count dwarfed the population of earth? Well now you can. With DiscordClicker!

DiscordClicker is like any other clicker game except it is centered around running a discord server.  Upgrades include, but aren't limited to, adding text channels, adding voice channels, banning trouble makers and even hacking discord!

Download and extract the zip to run the executable. 

Also check out GitHub for open source code on the game.

https://github.com/TardisSyntax666/DiscordClickerGame

Assets:

So... well... umm...

I made all the visuals... but the discord logos. (So please don't sue me!)

All sound including the background music was royalty free.

Background track was from https://www.bensound.com/

Button press track was from https://mixkit.co/ 

Font used: Caramel Sweets

Still in Development:

This game is still in development and as of right now the "save" and "load" buttons do not currently work, as those features are still yet to be implemented.
